import _objectSpread from"/home/ctrl/cmpt130/soko-osint/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";// src/utils/api.js
const API='http://127.0.0.1:5000';export async function apiFetch(path){let options=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};const res=await fetch("".concat(API).concat(path),_objectSpread({headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}},options));if(!res.ok){const err=await res.json().catch(()=>({error:'Unknown error'}));throw new Error(err.error||"HTTP ".concat(res.status));}return res.json();}export const api={health:()=>apiFetch('/api/health'),getInvestigations:()=>apiFetch('/api/investigations'),createInvestigation:username=>apiFetch('/api/investigations',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({username})}),runInvestigation:id=>apiFetch("/api/investigate/".concat(id),{method:'POST'}),getInvestigation:id=>apiFetch("/api/investigations/".concat(id)),deleteInvestigation:id=>apiFetch("/api/investigations/".concat(id),{method:'DELETE'})};
